divs: Sighting DetailsWhile sitting outside on my front porch drinking coffee, I happened to look up ( twards the east ) and noticed what appeared to be a very large star. Then I noticed that it was moving. It was brilliantly lit, and far to large to be a star.The size looked about four times larger than the north star. I would estimate height to be about 5000 ft, and range about 1-2 miles. It stayed on this heading, and I watched it for about 10 seconds, when suddenly it just dissappeared. Just like turning off a light switch. Gone. I knew then,that I had seen something very unusual.
Summary: While having morning coffee, sitting on front porch, witnessed what first appeared to be a very large star, but it was moving.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Houston
There was one other sighting in Houston on or around August 7th 2008
